RENAME THE FILE TO BE Settings.xml INSTEAD OF new_Settings.xml BEFORE USING! ALSO DON'T FORGET TO CHANGE THE TOKEN TO YOUR BOT'S TOKEN! <-->
BOT SETTINGS Token: Token for the bot that's running the program. BotOwnerID: Bot Owner's ID (aka, the only person who can use 'update'). UseMention: Commands are called via '@Bot ' if true. CommandPrefix: If UseMention is false, commands are called via ''. DeleteUserMessage: If true, the bot deletes the message that the player used to call it. DisableImages: If true, users cannot create images by adding an "i" after their scout type. NoGUI: If true, start the bot without a GUI. MaxShopLimit: The max amount of bundles a user can buy at a time with 'shop' <-->
YOUR_BOT_TOKEN_HERE YOUR_DISCORD_ID_HERE true $ false false false 10
IGNORED CHANNELS Channels that you don't want the bot to work in. <-->
GITHUB DATA REPOSITORY GitHub repository that the bot pulls images (Characters/Icons) as well as files (Banners.xml).
A custom repository may be replaced with this official one, but make sure to format your file locations similar to how it is formatted in the official repository. <--> https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Expugn/S-argo_Data/master/
SECRET WORD Inputting a valid secret word will unlock a secret. :eyes: <-->
GACHAPON RATES Rates used in the summon simulator.
By default, the rates are: - 69% for a Copper Character - 25% for a Silver Character - 4% for a Gold Character - 2% for a Platinum Character
If no Platinum character exists, the 2% gets added to the Copper Character rates. <-->
0.69 0.25 0.04 0.02
RECORD CRYSTAL RATES Rates for how much record crystals the user will get when scouting from a record crystal banner.
By default, the rates are: - 3% for 1 RC - 37% for 2 RC - 40% for 3 RC - 10% for 4 RC - 3.5% for 5 RC - 3.5% for 6 RC - 1% for 7 RC - 1% for 8 RC - 0.5% for 9 RC - 0.5% for 10 RC <-->
